title: 1 shot Thursday evening in Avondale
content:
CINCINNATI —
One person was shot Thursday evening in Avondale, Cincinnati police said.
The shooting happened just before 7:30 p.m. in the 3200 block of Wolseley Lane.
Police said that a 17-year-old man was shot in the back, and was taken to University of Cincinnati Medical Center with serious injuries.
Police have provided little information on the incident.
